price: 44. Ezali sé тропа mawa na biso, тре mpo bakoka kosepela na mwa tango токе.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
